top_comments.comment: It's always a pleasure dying in your videos
These are getting better and better all the time!
"You as the viewer." Yay, I finally made it to the credits of a music video!

comments_since_last_sample.body: I have a fun idea for a sort of backwards cover, although this could almost be a mashup at the same time. Do "I Can See Clearly Now", but give it a goth feel by using the background music from Smashing Pumpkins-Disarm, as if the beautiful, clear, sunny skies have just ruined the mood of the entire day 😁
